title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about selling gold by Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of a dream about a dead person selling gold. What if I dreamed that I was selling gold?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about selling gold. Does seeing gold sell portend good or bad? What are the negative interpretations of a dream about selling gold? What does selling white gold portend in a dream? In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of the vision of selling gold for single and married women, pregnant women and men, according to Ibn Sirin and the leading interpretation scholars. Interpretation of the dream of selling goldSelling gold in a dream means relief from distress and the end of troubles soon, and seeing an afflicted person brings him good news of paying off his debts and improving his standard of living. Soon. Dreaming about an unemployed person indicates that he will have a great job opportunity the next day, and if the dreamer sells gold in his dream while feeling happy, this indicates the good news that he will hear soon, and if the dreamer sells gold while he is sad, this portends his release. Of the financial burdens and responsibilities that have been occupying him recently. Scientists interpreted the dream of selling gold as a sign that the dreamer’s marriage contract is about to be concluded with a beautiful and wealthy girl who has a high status in society, and the vision of a married man shows that he is free of marital problems and disputes. And he enjoys peace of mind and peace with his wife, and it is said that selling gold bracelets is a sign of repentance from sins and a return to our Lord Almighty. Interpretation of the dream of selling gold by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of selling gold as relief from his distress and that he will soon reach a high position in his work, and he will He succeeds in his studies and achieves his dreams. If the dreamer sells a gold bracelet in her dream, it means that she will soon give birth to a beautiful child who will be successful and have a wonderful relationship in the future. Selling gold in a dream indicates a change in circumstances for the better and moving to a beautiful stage of life soon. Gold symbolizes one’s closeness to God (the Most High) and one’s continuous efforts to help those in need. The specialized online dream interpretation site features a selection of the best dream and vision interpreters in Arab world. To access it, type Online Dream Interpretation Site on Google. Interpretation of Dreams of Selling Gold for Single Women Scientists interpreted the dream of selling gold for single women as a sign that their problems and fears will collapse and that they will finally enjoy comfort and happiness. If the dreamer is selling the gold chain, this indicates that she will soon get rid of Of some things that limited her and made her feel helpless and in pain, but if the dreamer sold the engagement ring in his dream, this indicates that she will soon separate from her partner and this engagement will not take place. As for selling gold bracelets in the vision, it indicates that the dreamer will soon fall into a problem that she cannot Solve it alone, and you will not be able to get out of it without the help of a family member. Interpretation of a dream about selling gold to a married woman. Scientists have interpreted selling gold in a married woman’s dream as deceiving many people and slandering, and she must refrain from that until the Lord (Glory be to Him) is satisfied with her and forgives. She has her sins. It is said that a dream about selling gold indicates that the dreamer doubts her husband and is watching him

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a sick person in a dream?

preview.html: Seeing a sick person in a dream is one of the visions that causes anxiety and panic for the person who sees it, especially if the sick person that we saw in the dream is a person close to us, and the interpretation of seeing a sick person carries many connotations, including the presence of a deceitful person or a hypocritical person in that person’s life or the presence A great enemy is chasing the person who sees him, and the interpretation of this varies depending on the condition that the patient dreams about. His life and according to the type of disease, and in today’s article, Encyclopedia presents to you the interpretation of seeing a sick person in some detail. Interpretation of seeing a sick person in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin says: If a person sees in a dream the presence of a person suffering from cancer, this means that this person has many defects and he must Work to correct it. A good feeling. If a person sees a patient in the hospital in severe distress, this means that you will overcome a serious experience, but if you see a patient suffering from severe pain and crying in severe pain, this indicates that the person who sees him is suffering from many problems in his life and cannot control. Accordingly, this vision shows that the dreamer will waste a lot of money on useless things. But if one sees in a dream that a person is sick with a terminal illness or that he is seriously ill, this means that this person is going through a major financial crisis. Interpretation of seeing a sick person in a dream for a son Shaheen: Ibn Shaheen says that if a person sees in a dream a person who is healthy in reality, but suffering from excessive fatigue, this means that the dreamer is a hypocritical person and does many bad and false things, or that this person is hiding something very important. He does not tell you about that either..But if one sees in a dream that he is visiting a sick person, this indicates salvation from the worries and problems that the person suffers from in his life, and this vision indicates hearing a lot of good and joyful news during the coming period.But if one sees In a dream, someone close to him is healed, as this indicates repentance, keeping away from sins, and being close to God Almighty. But if one sees in his dream that another person is sick and is suffering a lot from a lot of pain and illness and has many injuries, this means that the dreamer is suffering from a big problem and cannot solve it and may lose his job and money. Interpretation of seeing illness in an unmarried girl’s dream: Jurists say Interpretation of dreams: Seeing illness in an unmarried girl’s dream carries many different connotations, such as if a girl sees in her dream that she is suffering from an illness, this indicates that she is in good health and enjoys great beauty. However, if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is suffering from cancer, this means that she She will get married soon, but if she sees that she has recovered from an illness she feels, this means that her engagement has been canceled and it will be so. end. All her emotional relationships. Interpretation of seeing illness in a married woman’s dream: Dream interpretation scholars say that if a married woman sees in her dream that she is suffering from a serious illness, this indicates stability and happiness in married life. However, if she sees that she is suffering from a serious illness, this indicates a lot of Nutrition, and if she sees that her husband has an illness

title: Interpretation of a dream about changing workplace and moving to a new job

preview.html: Contents: Interpretation of dreams about moving from one place of work to another. I dreamed of being transferred from my job, moving to a new place of work, and changing profession. Working on a dream by Ibn Sirin. Your presence at work indicates activity and vitality, because whoever does not work is lazy. Moving to work indicates a change in things. If you do not If the other party has more money, this indicates an increase in expenses, God willing. Interpretation of dreams that you are changing jobs and you are still in the same job. It is a dream that means your need for change in your life, not necessarily changing jobs, or perhaps your style or behavior in them. Perhaps the dream means the need to Change your life routine. If you dream of a job interview, this is good news of a happy occasion for you, and indicates a job that will bring you a lot of good and abundant livelihood, God willing. In addition to the above, some of them said that seeing a job in a dream may indicate that one may be unemployed and must To look for a job and depend on God. Interpretation of the YouTube vision

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing dried milk in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about dried milk in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that seeing dried milk in a dream is one of the visions that indicate many good things and livelihood. Also, seeing bags of dried milk in a dream indicates an increase in the money that the dreamer will obtain and Ali Salah Ahwal. As in the interpretation of Dreaming of dried milk in a dream shows a diet with a lot of money with ease and without fatigue and problems, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin, in his book Interpretation of Dreams, referred to dreaming of milk in a dream as a good vision that indicates kindness, money, and wellness. Interpretation of seeing dried milk in a dream for a woman For a single woman, seeing milk in one dream means happiness and joys that the girl will have in her next life and a good marriage for her. Milk is one of the visions that indicate that she heard the good and happy news in her life. It fulfills what she desires, and God knows best. Dairy and packaging in the dream of an unmarried girl is good news that she will get married in the coming days. Coming with a righteous man who suits her, and God knows best. Also, seeing powdered milk in general in the dreams of an unmarried woman indicates the fulfillment of the goals and wishes that the girl hopes for from God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing powdered milk in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees herself drinking milk in a dream, then this It indicates the arrival of kindness and a lot of livelihood that she and her husband will receive. Also, if one considers the presence of the husband in a dream, then working inside the dairy is one of the visions that indicate upcoming livelihood for the husband, which will make his next life happier, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing powdered milk in a dream for a woman Pregnant woman: Seeing dried and powdered milk in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates safety and indicates the ease of childbirth without any problems and the birth of a male child. Seeing milk in a dream and drinking it, and it tasting great, is one of the visions that portends many good things that the pregnant woman will have in her next life. And buy Milk from the husband in a dream for a pregnant woman is a harbinger of a lot of nutrition that the husband will receive, and God knows best, and disputes and problems between them will be resolved. Interpretation of seeing dried milk in a dream for a man: Seeing a man bringing milk in his dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicate the arrival of a lot of property and money that He will acquire it in his next life. Milk in general in a man’s dream is one of the visions that portend goodness, happiness, and peace of mind, because it indicates the fulfillment of desires and goals. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a complete jalabiya in a dream?

preview.html: Trend provides you with the complete interpretation of seeing the Jalabiya in a dream. The jalabiya or robe is a long, modest garment for men and women. It is characterized by many colors and is spread all over the world, especially in the Arab and Islamic world. Therefore, the white robe in a dream is considered complete, or the interpretation of washing the robe in a complete dream is one of the dreams that many have had, and here we present for you, our distinguished followers, the interpretation of washing the robe in a complete dream. The dream is complete, as is the interpretation of wearing brown robes in a dream, and everything related to buying robes in a dream is complete for married women, pregnant women, the elderly, and men. This was written by major scholars and they interpret dreams and visions. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the Jalabiya? The interpretation of seeing the Jalabiya in a dream is complete, and that was in the dreams of the young man, as it is one of the visions that indicate the approaching marriage of a beautiful girl. Ibn Sirin also showed that the man He sees himself in a dream wearing a wide robe, which is a sign of nourishment, kindness, and making money. He also sees himself wearing a black robe in a dream, full and torn, and this indicates many problems and difficulties that the dreamer is going through. Also, seeing someone in a dream full and wearing A woman’s robe shows the weakness and fragility of his personality. Seeing buying a jalabiya in a dream is full of desirable dreams that indicate happiness, good luck, and improving circumstances. A jalabiya in a dream about a common woman. The interpretation of seeing a beautiful silk or wool dress in a dream, complete for a common woman, is one of the dreams that indicates Her marriage to a wealthy person. Also, dreaming of a woman in a bowl wearing a loose dress is evidence that God has bestowed upon her a lot of goodness and benefit. Seeing Galamia in a dream that is complete and white in color means that he will enter into a new relationship that will end in a happy marriage. Seeing a torn dress in a complete dream for a woman is a dream bowl. Undesirable portends tragedies and scandals in this world, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of a married woman’s jalabiya? When a married woman sees herself in a dream wearing a white or light-colored robe, this means that she will become pregnant soon. Seeing a married woman completely taking off her dress in a dream means that she is passing through With a period full of difficulties, problems and serious problems. Also, seeing a married woman buying a whole galabiya in a dream is good news that God will bless her with a lot of money in a very short time. What is the interpretation of seeing a galabiya for a pregnant woman? The interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman buying a galabiya in a dream is full of visions that indicate On the ease and accessibility of childbirth, God willing. Seeing a complete galabiya in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence of many happy and favorable differences in her coming life. Seeing complete chaos in a dream means kindness and blessings for the pregnant woman, and indicates the nearness of joys, pleasures, and good news in her life. The white galabiya in A complete dream. title: Signs of envy in Ibn Sirin’s dream

preview.html: Among the signs of envy in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, there are many different signs that indicate envy in a dream, through which a person can know that he is envied, so envy is a disease that afflicts a person and the treatment in this case is. Ruqyah is legitimate, and even each of us may be exposed. Everyone who has been blessed with blessings and relief has envy. It is possible to be influenced by envy who wants to take away the blessing of others, to become someone else's, especially since envy can happen intentionally or unintentionally, even this envy can lead to death as it causes many people to die. Things that harm a man, and as it is said that the eye is right, what is meant by that is that the envious eye envies it and hopes for the death of the blessed, and through this article we will learn about the signs of envy in a dream from Ibn Sirin. How do I know who hit me in the eye in a dream? Someone saw you in a dream. A blessing and he admired it and watched it without blessing it or saying, God willing, and wished it would be his. You must gather those who saw you and God’s time upon you and His blessings upon you, that He saw you and did not provide you with this blessing, and now, dear followers, we will show you more things that answer you in this. The blessed question: How do I know who hit me in the eye in a dream: If you feel jealous and want to know who hurt you, bring a piece of paper and write down all the people who saw you while you were getting a job or some of God’s blessings. After this step, collect the names that you suspect are the ones that She envies you and winks at you, bring her and place your hand on your chest and say this supplication out loud (In the name of God, heal me from envy and the evil eye of so-and-so) and it must be repeated for a period of no less than 5 minutes. If you do not find any improvement in your own life and nothing changes about what happened to you, then this It means that it has nothing to do with the envy that has afflicted you. And if you find that person, you must perform ruqyah yourself with the legitimate ruqyah, and God is the best provider. See also: Interpretation of dreams of a man chasing me for a single woman in a dream. Symbols that indicate envy in a dream. There are a group of signs and symbols through which it is known Envy has afflicted you, and even if you are not sure, you should consider supplication, reading the Holy Qur’an, and knowing that God Almighty is the All-Knowing. All-knowing and the best supervisor. One of the signs of envy in a dream is seeing powerful and predatory animals often and constantly. Seeing beautiful things or beauty in a dream indicates eye injury. Seeing a black snake in a dream is a sign of envy. Seeing donkeys, cats, and hedgehogs are signs of envy. Seeing abandoned houses or abandoned places, this indicates envy. Observing impure things, their place, blood, and excrement, and this indicates the presence of magic and envy. See also: Interpretation of a dream about miscarriage for a married, non-pregnant woman, according to Ibn Sirin. Through our website, we have presented to you an excellent article entitled (Signs of Envy In the dream) In addition to that we have shown you symbols that indicate envy in a dream, you must pray and do not rush, I hope you and the loyalty of God Almighty follow us through our website we publish for you a lot of exclusive news

Seeing abandoned houses or abandoned places, this indicates envy. Observing impure things, their place, blood, and excrement, and this indicates the presence of magic and envy. See also: Interpretation of a dream about miscarriage for a married, non-pregnant woman, according to Ibn Sirin. Through our website, we have presented to you an excellent article entitled (Signs of Envy In the dream) In addition to that we have shown you symbols that indicate envy in a dream, you must pray and do not rush, I hope you and the loyalty of God Almighty follow us through our website we publish for you a lot of exclusive news

title: Interpretation of a dream about an earthquake. The meaning of an earthquake in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of earthquakes and earthquakes for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a married woman, or a single person, whether the ground shakes in the house or room, or there is a slight or strong tremor, the making of the road, etc., by Ibn Sirini. Interpretation scholars tend to see earthquakes, earthquakes, and the like as harmful ground movements to which the same ruling applies in interpretation. He will step down from the decision, or he will leave power and the people of the country will suffer as a ruler after him. Some scholars have interpreted that the earthquake that struck a particular country may indicate that its people are infected with a disease or a rampant epidemic spreading among the people. Interpretation of a dream about seeing an earthquake in a dream: Who dreams of moving a mountain From his place and then returns to the way it was, or he sees an earthquake hitting a mountain, or that the mountain has been completely removed, or he sees a mountain flying in the air and then returns to the place, this indicates a great turmoil that will afflict the ruler and the rulers, or that there is a battle between them, inside and then it disappears. The situation continues according to the strength and time of the earthquake, as in the vision. The earthquake in the dream shows that the plants of this land are growing and blooming, the grass is abundant, and trees and flowers are spreading. What is the meaning of a dream about an earthquake? One of the clearest meanings symbolized by a dream about an earthquake is the fear of problems that may occur. They arise in the future, and this is the result of facing many difficulties, whether in professional, social, family, or other life, so if you see an earthquake in a dream, it may be a sign of major misfortunes that may occur. Also, among the interpretations that a dream about an earthquake can bring, we point out To the fear you feel when you face a new stage in your life and have to make some radical changes. A strong earthquake can symbolize a new beginning full of difficulties and hesitation. Therefore, every time you see an earthquake in a dream, and you are about to make a change in your life, you should be more careful. Also, the occurrence of an earthquake in a dream indicates loss and poverty, especially at the professional level, and this is due to the destruction that you see in your dream, as many Damaged and destroyed buildings lead to a great loss that may occur to you as a result. Some material, financial or professional problems. In addition, an earthquake in a dream can indicate the loss of a lover, relative, husband or someone close to you, especially if you see in a dream that you are looking for a missing person under the rubble and destruction in the earthquake, so be careful about context, you may witness a divorce, the cancellation of an engagement, or the death of someone close to you. In the end, we must not forget that what a person sees in a dream is sometimes good news from God and sometimes it is self-talk or it may be intimidation from Satan. Dream of an earthquake - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about falling in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like it FansSubscribed Fans Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of falling in a dream: He may dream of falling from a high place, such as a mountain, the roof of a building, or a tall tower, and the dream of falling from a high place has many interpretations. The interpretation of this vision varies depending on the viewer, whether he is single, married, or pregnant, and the interpretation varies according to the reasons and symbols. Each vision is individual, like falling to the ground. Or from a stairway or a balcony. Interpretation of falling by Ibn Sirin Some interpreters, led by Ibn Sirin, believe that falling in a dream has good connotations, because it means success and improvement of the situation for the visionary. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of falling Other interpreters of visions and dreams, including Al-Nabulsi, believe that falling in a dream has connotations Bad and foul vision, as it indicates crises that the dreamer may face, such as failure in family life, separation from the wife, and failure in work life. Life is leaving or quitting work, and God knows best. Interpretation of the vision of falling for a bachelor’s degree. Falling in an unmarried girl’s dream means moving on to a new life, foretelling the arrival of the groom and his engagement. It shows that she is on the cusp of new beginnings that will bring her joy and happiness, and God is higher and knows best. Interpretation of seeing a married woman falling if the dreamer is married. She saw in her dream that she was falling from a high position, so this is not good, because it indicates her inability to have children and a bad sign, because it indicates menopause. Or she will not give birth to more children. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman falling When a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is falling from a height, this indicates extreme anxiety and tension that she may face during childbirth, but she will pass this stage successfully and safely for herself and her child, God Almighty. Interpretation of falling to the ground in a dream: If one sees Oneself falling to the ground in a dream, this indicates the death of worry, relief from distress, and the arrival of relief and salvation, especially if it contains water, but if it contains stones, this indicates the occurrence of disasters. And the difficulties that the dreamer will face in his life. Interpretation of falling from the stairs in a dream: Descending the stairs in a dream is an undesirable sign, as it indicates the failure of the dreamer and his failure to achieve the goal he wanted to achieve, and sometimes it can indicate overcoming some adversities and difficulties, and God knows best. Interpretation Falling from a balcony in a dream When a person dreams of falling from a balcony or balcony, this indicates that the person will do a very bad act that will humiliate him in the eyes of people in general and the family in particular, and God knows best.

title: Interpretation of seeing lions in a dream

preview.html: Lions in a dream have different interpretations. Seeing lions in a dream can symbolize good or evil. The interpretation of seeing lions in a dream varies depending on several factors, the most important of which is the situation that lions are in, or more specifically, whether lions are pets or otherwise. Likewise, the interpretation of a dream about lions depends on the social position of the viewer, as well as the position that the viewer feels towards the visitor, or in a clearer sense, whether the dreamer is afraid of the seven or not, or vice versa. Therefore, we discuss in this article on the encyclopedia website a simplified explanation of the most important dreams that sparked controversy about seeing lions in a dream. First: Interpretation of lions in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing lions in a dream with different and multiple interpretations, and the most important thing is what Ibn Sirin explained about seeing lions. Lions in a dream can be determined through the following: Ibn Sirin confirmed that if a lion enters a house, and there is no sick person in it, this indicates that one of the members of the house is exposed to a health problem. If the dreamer sees that the seven are killing him, this is a sign that the dreamer has been robbed, or He is afflicted with hardships and adversities, or it may be a sign of the end of life. Seeing the seven standing on the pulpit of the mosque indicates that a person has assumed power or a prominent position, which indicates that this person is dishonest, incorrect, and will bring many misfortunes to people. From He sees that the seven have caused him harm, then this is an indication that the dreamer will fall into a disaster due to the extent of the damage he suffered in the dream. Whoever sees that he is riding the seven, this indicates the ability of the visionary to reach the position he wants to reach or to obtain something precious and great other than Expected. Whoever sees himself fighting lions, this is evidence that the dreamer will quarrel with enemies, or the dream may be an indication of rivalry. If a person sees that he has obtained a seven, this is an indication that benefits, goodness and happiness will arrive for him and his family. And whoever sees that he is riding the seven and the seven are calm This is evidence of the insight’s success in defeating enemies and overcoming oppression, injustice, and humiliation. The entry of lions into a city is evidence of the entry of injustice, oppression, and humiliation into that city. Whoever sees that he becomes seven, this is an indication that the behavior of the insight will change for the worse, and he will be unjust and omnipotent. And strong. If a person sees that he is riding the seventh and is afraid, this indicates that he will fall into calamities and misfortunes and be unable to overcome them. Second: Interpretation of lions in a dream for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried girl with lions in a dream indicates the presence of enemies around her, and lions In a dream, it indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to injustice, oppression, and exploitation, and seeing lions in a dream means that the dreamer will do so. He suffers from worries, anxiety, and sorrows as a result of major problems, such as eating, for example. He has a great livelihood and will live to achieve the ambitions, goals, and desires that he wants and aspires to achieve. Third: Interpretation of monsters in a dream for a married woman: Dream interpreters have confirmed that a married woman who sees lions in a dream indicates And
